articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: John McGinn has stressed the need for Scotland to back up their stunning victory in Oslo with another three points against Georgia at Hampden on Tuesday.
articles.title: 'I know I'm not supposed to' - John McGinn admission over Scotland inspiration behind Norway comeback win

articles.author: Oliver Anderson
articles.description: Scotland Under-21s followed their senior counterparts in coming from behind to claim a result against Norway.
articles.title: Scotland Under-21s almost emulate seniors after coming from behind against Norway - two Celtic and two Rangers starlets start

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: As an explanation for the, from-nowhere, tsunami that resulted in Scotland sweeping away Norway in Oslo, you had to hand it to Steve Clarke for finding just the right words.
articles.title: An ode to Steve Clarke - the man with unshakeable belief who has changed everything for Scotland

articles.author: Aidan Smith
articles.description: As Hibernian were preparing to unveil the new slogan on the front of the shirts, I’m imagining there might have been some nervous excitement down Easter Road way. The sponsorship deal would be “the biggest of its kind” for the club, but, er, what about that name?
articles.title: Aidan Smith: No 10 has “wine-time Fridays” but will football ever get its “beer-time Saturdays” back?

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: While there was delirium in the Scotland camp after the stunning comeback win in Oslo, there was anguish for Norway at the realisation their Euro 2024 qualifying hopes may have suffered a fatal blow.
articles.title: Arsenal's Martin Odegaard unimpressed with Scotland as Norway talisman insists 'better team lost'

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Andy Robertson admitted qualifying for the European Championships in Germany next year is now a must for Scotland after the stunning comeback win over Norway in Oslo.
articles.title: Andy Robertson admits Scotland 'have to qualify' for Euro 2024 after epic late win over Norway

articles.author: Alan Pattullo
articles.description: A tight, compact stadium full of expectant home fans. A returning hero. Stiflingly muggy conditions and hosts in dire need of a victory.
articles.title: Scotland eclipse Spain win with Norway comeback as Erling Haaland demoted to surprise spectator

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Steve Clarke may have worried about sunburn in Oslo but any concerns over a Euro 2024 qualification slip-up were obliterated with a stunning late comeback as his Scotland side claimed a dramatic 2-1 victory over Norway.
articles.title: Steve Clarke revels in Scotland's huge Norway win - and reveals why tracksuit top stayed on in 30 degree heat

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Scotland gave their Euro 2024 qualification hopes a huge boost with a 2-1 victory in Norway after a dramatic late comeback. Here is how the Scotland players rated out of 10…
articles.title: Scotland player ratings: the defender who stood up to Haaland and the standout who did the work of two men

articles.description: Brendan Rodgers is in line to be confirmed as the next manager of Celtic within the next 48 hours, according to a report.

articles.description: Scotland manager Steve Clarke stressed the need to focus on “Norway the team” rather than become obsessed with trying to stop Erling Haaland.
